abstract: Banco Santander reports quarterly profit of 1.72 billion euros, or about $1.87 billion, up from 1.3 billion euros in year-earlier period; figures meet analyst expectations.
lead_paragraph: New loans to businesses increased 24 percent in the first quarter, the bank said, and new loans to individuals rose 36 percent.

headline.main: Banco Santander’s Profit Rises 32 Percent, Fueled by Recovery in Spain

snippet: New loans to businesses increased 24 percent in the first quarter, the bank said, and new loans to individuals rose 36 percent.
